attributes.action: Sack Baroness Scotland she had failed to comply with rules governing employment of workers from outside the EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the undersigned petition the prime minister to sack baroness scotland as she had failed to comply with rules governing employment of workers from outside the eu.she also had failed to keep copies of documents relating to her former housekeeper loloahi tapui in breach of the immigration, nationality and asylum act piloted through the lords in 2006 by scotland when she was a home Office minister.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
